amendment.description: To prevent Federal employees from purchasing unnecessary first-class or premium-class airline tickets at taxpayers' expense.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3289 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 90 - 0. Record Vote Number: 365.

action.text: Amendment SA 3289 proposed by Senator DeMint. (consideration: CR S12894-12895, S12897-12898; text: CR S12895) To prevent Federal employees from purchasing unnecessary first-class or premium-class airline tickets at taxpayers' expense.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3289 proposed by Senator DeMint.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3289 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 90 - 0. Record Vote Number: 365.
